senses.sense_definition: Used as a musical direction to indicate that a passage is to be played or sung very loudly.

examples.text: The conductor signaled the orchestra to play the finale <w>fortissimo</w>.
You need to sing <w>fortissimo</w> in this section to be heard over the instruments.

senses.sense_definition: A musical passage that is played very loudly, or the symbol denoting this.

examples.text: The symphony ended with a dramatic <w>fortissimo</w> that shook the hall.
There is a sudden <w>fortissimo</w> marked in the third bar of the score.
